channel.title: Data Science Projects on Jinxiang Ma - Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Projects on Jinxiang Ma - Portfolio

item.title: Understanding Critical Factors of Minority and Transferred Students in U.S. Schools
item.description:
Performed Simple Linear Regression and Multiple Linear Regression on college enrollment data to determine factors affecting the number of college students.

Project Overview
#

This project analyzes college enrollment data to understand the critical factors that influence minority and transferred student populations in U.S. schools. Through comprehensive statistical analysis, I identified key variables that impact student enrollment patterns and educational outcomes.

item.title: Poverty Prediction with Census and Education Data
item.description:
Comprehensive machine learning analysis using PCA, hierarchical clustering, and multiple classification methods to predict poverty rates from census and education data.

Project Overview
#

This project leverages machine learning techniques to predict poverty rates using county-level census and education data. The analysis employs dimensionality reduction, clustering analysis, and various classification algorithms to understand the relationship between demographic factors and poverty levels.

item.title: Time Series Forecasting on SFO Air Passenger Statistics
item.description:
Developed and implemented a SARIMA model to forecast 12-month passenger traffic at San Francisco International Airport using historical data from 2005-2019.

Project Overview
#

This comprehensive time series analysis project examines passenger traffic patterns at San Francisco International Airport (SFO) over a 15-year period. Using advanced statistical modeling techniques, I developed a Seasonal Autoregressive Integrated Moving Average (SARIMA) model to forecast future passenger volumes and identify underlying trends in air travel data.
